clues.text: (Nancy Lee Grahn and Michelle Stafford give the clue as Alexis and Nina fromGeneral Hospital.) "You think you're getting away with it, Nina, but I'm on to you""Oh, really Alexis? Well your little world, your sterile field, is about to be in this condition, compromised by the introduction of foreign bacteria"
